data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Privacy alerts on sensitive record access". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Opportunity Pipeline (Deals, Stages, and Probability). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
